sql-statements.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT o.org_id, o.name_primary, o.category, DECODE(t.group_name, 'other', 'main', t.group_name) FROM org o, org_category cat, org_type t WHERE cat.parent_id = o.org_internal_id AND cat.member_name = t.caption AND cat.member_name = ( SELECT caption FROM org_type WHERE id = ( SELECT MIN(id) FROM org_type, org_category WHERE parent_id = o.org_internal_id AND caption = member_name ) ) AND UPPER(cat.member_name) = ? AND ( owner_org_id IS NULL OR owner_org_id = ? ) ORDER BY o.org_id ) WHERE rownum <= 250
